FrageText.de: Wen oder was könnte der Kleinbus verdecken?
FrageText.en: Whom or what could the minibus be blocking your view of?
FrageText.hr: Koga ili što bi mogao zaklanjati mini-bus?
FrageText.sl: Koga ali kaj lahko kombi zakrije?
FrageText.tr: Minibüs kimi ya da neyi kapatabilir?

en.Text: Vehicles that are coming from the left

hr.Text: Vozila koja dolaze s lijeve strane

sl.Text: Pešce na zaznamovanem prehodu za pešce
